text: @kaitlancollins It’s an optic @realDonaldTrump @VP doesn’t want to present to #america how serious #coronavirus is. @CDCgov would cause panic #wherearethetests @JoeBiden @BarackObama @SpeakerPelosi @jonkarl @PeterAlexander over 55k lost lives still failing us all @robreiner @tomhanks @SRuhle
